vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀποστομ-ᾰτίζω,
(στόμα) teach by word of mouth, teach by dictation, γράμματα ἀ.[Refs 5th c.BC+] —passive, τὸ ἀποστοματιζόμενον dictated lesson, [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__2 interrogate, catechize, as a master his pupil, [NT+5th c.BC+]
__II repeat by heart, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]: generally, recite, repeat, [Refs 1st c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to besiege with questions, interrogate closely
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to besiege with questions, interrogate closely
primarily to speak or repeat offhand; also, to require or lead others to speak without premeditation, as by questions calculated to elicit unpremeditated answers, to endeavor to entrap into unguarded language, Lk. 11:53*

vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 盘问, 质询, 测试 (路11:53)
